entry.label: SDN:P021:68:FBAF = Fish taxonomy-related ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the bed
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:FBAF = Fish taxonomy-related ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the bed
entry.description: Fish (Osteichthyes, Agnatha and Chondrichthyes) ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of bed (sea, river, lake etc.) parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. Includes animals normally considered as planktonic if they have been returned from sediment samples.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:FCNT = Fish taxonomy-related counts
entry.description: Fish (Osteichthyes, Agnatha and Chrondrichthyes) count parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards. Count includes presence/absence indicators.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GP087 = Fishery characterisation
entry.description: Parameters describing the extent, intensity, timing and method of fisheries

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GP080 = Fishing by-catch
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the capture of non-target species during commercial and non-commercial fishing trips

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:FDMS = Gas fluxes between the water column and the atmosphere
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:FDMS = Gas fluxes between the water column and the atmosphere
entry.description: Fluxes of any gaseous species from water column to atmosphere

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:DBDX = Geological sample density
entry.description: Parameters that describe the the mass per unit volume of any samples of rock or unlithified sediment.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:XMGS = Geological sample magnetic, electrical and acoustic properties
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:XMGS = Geological sample magnetic, electrical and acoustic properties
entry.description: Any parameters quantifying the magnetic (e.g. magnetic susceptibility), electrical (e.g. resistivity) or acoustic (e.g. P-wave propogation speed) of sediment or rock cores and samples

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SRAD = Geological sample radioactivity
entry.description: Any parameters quantifying ionising radiation emitted by cores or samples comprising rock, sediment (including surface sediment such as fluff)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GTCH = Geotechnics
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the properties of rocks and sediments that are relevance to engineering such as physical strength and load-bearing capacity. Includes the disciplines of rock mechanics and soil mechanics.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:HFLW = Geothermal heat flow
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the flux of thermal energy within the solid Earth or between the solid Earth and water bodies or atmosphere.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GRAV = Gravity
entry.description: Parameters relating to the measurement of the Earth's gravity field

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GWAM = Groundwater amount
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the amount of groundwater in a given system such as aquifer water level and rate of flow of water through rock formations.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GWCH = Groundwater chemistry
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the chemistry of terrestrial groundwater bodies such as aquifers and waters percolating through rock formations.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:HBCH = Habitat characterisation
entry.description: Parameters specifying the physical or chemical environment of a place where an organism is found.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:HBEX = Habitat extent
entry.description: Parameters specifying the vertical and horizontal spatial extent of the ecological character of a place where an organism is found

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:HZNV = Hazards to navigation
entry.description: Parameters describing the location, nature and extent of objects that pose a threat to travel on the water column such as wrecks and obstructions

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:HFLX = Heat fluxes between the water column and the atmosphere
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:HFLX = Heat fluxes between the water column and the atmosphere
entry.description: Parameters quantifying heat exchange between any body of water and the atmosphere

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:APDA = Horizontal platform movement
entry.description: All parameters relating to horizontal platform travel, including distance run

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ALAT = Horizontal spatial co-ordinates
entry.description: All forms of horizontal spatial coordinates such as lat/lon and grid references

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:RFVL = Horizontal velocity of the water column (currents)
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:RFVL = Horizontal velocity of the water column (currents)
entry.description: Parameters expressing the velocity (including scalar speeds and directions) of water column horizontal movement, commonly termed Eulerian currents

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IAGE = Ice age
entry.description: Measured or stratigraphically estimated age of ice

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ICEM = Ice motion and related parameters
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ICEM = Ice motion and related parameters
entry.description: Parameters specifying the speed and direction of sea or land ice and the stresses associated with this motion.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IACT = Industrial activity
entry.description: Parameters that quantify the level of industrial activity or industrial output

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IDIS = Industrial discharges
entry.description: Parameters that quantify and specify material output into the environment as a result of industrial activity

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:RMIN = Inorganic chemical composition of sediment or rocks
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:RMIN = Inorganic chemical composition of sediment or rocks
entry.description: Parameters specifying the proportions of inorganic components (major/minor/trace elements, trace metals etc.) in sediment or rock samples. Major elements includes the H2O+ and H2O- parameters reported by convention in oxide weight per cent geochemical major element analyses.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IPRX = Inorganic peroxides in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:IPRX = Inorganic peroxides in water bodies
entry.description: Parameters related to compounds containing two oxygen atoms joined by a single bond but no carbon atoms in any body of fresh or salt water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PHAT = Inorganic phosphorus species concentrations in the atmosphere
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PHAT = Inorganic phosphorus species concentrations in the atmosphere
entry.description: Concentration of inorganic phosphorus species (element or compounds) in any phase of the atmosphere

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SIAT = Inorganic silicon species concentrations in the atmosphere
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:SIAT = Inorganic silicon species concentrations in the atmosphere
entry.description: Concentration of inorganic silicon species (element or compounds) in any phase of the atmosphere

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IWAB = Insect and earthworm taxonomy-related abundance per unit area of the bed
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:IWAB = Insect and earthworm taxonomy-related abundance per unit area of the bed
entry.description: Insect (Class Insecta) and earthworm (Subclass Oligochaeta) abundance per unit area of bed (sea, river, lake etc.) parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. Includes animals normally considered as planktonic if they have been returned from sediment samples. This parameter group has been implemented to separate predominantly freshwater taxa from predominantly marine taxa.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:INLZ = Insect and earthworm taxonomy-related abundance per unit area of the littoral zone
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:INLZ = Insect and earthworm taxonomy-related abundance per unit area of the littoral zone
entry.description: Insect (Class Insecta) and earthworm (Subclass Oligochaeta) abundance per unit area of the littoral zone (between spring tide high and low water) parameters.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IWDX = Insect and earthworm taxonomy-related ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the bed
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:IWDX = Insect and earthworm taxonomy-related ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the bed
entry.description: Insect (Class Insecta) and earthworm (Subclass Oligochaeta) ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of bed (sea, river, lake etc.) parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. Includes animals normally considered as planktonic if they have been returned from sediment samples. This parameter group has been implemented to separate predominantly freshwater taxa from predominantly marine taxa.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IALZ = Insect and earthworm taxonomy-related ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the littoral zone
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:IALZ = Insect and earthworm taxonomy-related ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the littoral zone
entry.description: Insect (Class Insecta) and earthworm (Subclass Oligochaeta) ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the littoral zone (between spring tide high and low water) parameters.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IATX = Insecta taxonomy-related abundance per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:IATX = Insecta taxonomy-related abundance per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Insecta abundance parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IATC = Insecta taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:IATC = Insecta taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Insecta carbon biomass parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:LGCR = Lagrangian currents and transport rates in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:LGCR = Lagrangian currents and transport rates in the water column
entry.description: Parameters expressing the mean nett transport rates within the water column like Lagrangian currents. Note this is an unintentional duplicate of VDFC.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:LSST = Land surface temperature
entry.description: Parameters relating to land surface temperature including fire and other hot spot location

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:LVEG = Land vegetation
entry.description: Parameters relating to land (including marshes and the intertidal zone) vegetation

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PPAB = Light absorption in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PPAB = Light absorption in the water column
entry.description: Water column spectral absorption parameters

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:EXCO = Light extinction and diffusion coefficients
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:EXCO = Light extinction and diffusion coefficients
entry.description: Parameters relating to the extent of light penetration into the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CD10 = Lipid (fatty acids, sterols or isoprenoid compounds) concentrations in sediment
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:CD10 = Lipid (fatty acids, sterols or isoprenoid compounds) concentrations in sediment
entry.description: Lipids are defined as small water-insoluble biomolecules generally containing fatty acids, sterols, or isoprenoid compounds. Sediment is defined as material collected by a corer including fluff).

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:F001 = Lipid (fatty acids, sterols or isoprenoid compounds) concentrations in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:F001 = Lipid (fatty acids, sterols or isoprenoid compounds) concentrations in the water column
entry.description: Concentrations of lipids in all phases of the water column excluding concentrations of lipid per unit weight of the SPM. Lipids are defined as small water-insoluble biomolecules generally containing fatty acids, sterols, or isoprenoid compounds.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:LITH = Lithology
entry.description: Parameters describing rocks on the basis of physical characteristics such as colour, structure, mineralogy and grain size

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:LITT = Litter abundance and type
entry.description: Parameters describing the abundance and nature of material classed as refuse introduced to the environment by activities of man.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GP012 = Macroalgae and seagrass infection and damage
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:GP012 = Macroalgae and seagrass infection and damage
entry.description: Parameters relating to diseases and parasites of macroalgae (Rhodophycota, Chromphycota, Chlorophycota) and seagrass (Charophyta, Anthophyta) and damage to seagrass beds

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ACNT = Macroalgae and seagrass taxonomy-related counts
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ACNT = Macroalgae and seagrass taxonomy-related counts
entry.description: Macroalgae (Rhodophycota, Chromphycota, Chlorophycota) and seagrass (Charophyta, Anthophyta) count parameters presented at the level of taxa at any level from sub-species upwards. Count includes presence/absence indicators.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PU02 = Macroalgae generic abundance in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PU02 = Macroalgae generic abundance in water bodies
entry.description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, number per litre) of macroalgae (seaweeds) designated by terms other than taxonomic names (e.g. total) in any fresh or salt water body.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MMAN = Magnetics
entry.description: Parameterisations of the intensity and inclination of Earth's magnetic field

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MMST = Man-made structures
entry.description: Parameters relating to human built structures on the coast or offshore and their impact on the environment.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MARC = Marine archaeology
entry.description: Parameters related to the study of human interaction with the sea through the investigation of associated physical remains, be they vessels, shore side facilities, port-related structures, cargoes, human remains or submerged landscapes

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:TMES = Metadata parameters
entry.description: Data parameters that carry information relating to a measured parameter such as measurement temperatures, integration depths, quantities sampled and incubation durations

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:BCMT = Metal concentrations in biota
entry.description: Metal concentrations in either whole organisms or their constituent parts.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MTPW = Metal concentrations in sediment pore waters
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MTPW = Metal concentrations in sediment pore waters
entry.description: Concentrations of metal elements in sediment pore waters

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MTAT = Metal concentrations in the atmosphere
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MTAT = Metal concentrations in the atmosphere
entry.description: Concentration of metal elements in any phase of the atmosphere

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MTIC = Metal concentrations in the cryosphere
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MTIC = Metal concentrations in the cryosphere
entry.description: Concentration parameters for metallic elements in ice and snow

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SCDO = Metal fluxes between the bed and the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:SCDO = Metal fluxes between the bed and the water column
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the exchange of metalsbetween the bed (ie the sediment) and the water column sometimes termed benthic fluxes

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZNLG = Metal ligand parameters in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ZNLG = Metal ligand parameters in the water column
entry.description: Parameters concerned with the complexation of metals as ligands in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CDRU = Metal uptake rates in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:CDRU = Metal uptake rates in the water column
entry.description: Parameters relating to the uptake rates of metals from the dissolved phase into the particulate phase

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MZBN = Microzooplankton generic abundance in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MZBN = Microzooplankton generic abundance in water bodies
entry.description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, number per litre) of microzooplankton (free swimming heterotrophic organisms smaller than 200um) designated by terms other than taxonomic names (e.g. total) in any fresh or salt water body.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MZCT = Microzooplankton grazing
entry.description: Parameters that express the consumption of the phytoplankton population by the microzooplankton. Generally the results of dilution experiments on water samples screened through a 200-micron mesh.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MZBC = Microzooplankton non taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MZBC = Microzooplankton non taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Basically, any microzooplankton carbon biomass measurement that isn't included in parameter group MATC. May include data integrations such as 'total microzooplankton'.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MATX = Microzooplankton taxonomic abundance in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MATX = Microzooplankton taxonomic abundance in water bodies
entry.description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, number per litre) of microzooplankton (free swimming heterotrophic organisms smaller than 200um) designated by taxonomic names (e.g. species, genus or family) in any fresh or salt water body.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MATC = Microzooplankton taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MATC = Microzooplankton taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Microzooplankton carbon biomass parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards., but exclude morphological classifications such as 'heterotrophic flagellate'.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:A999 = Microzooplankton taxonomy-related biosurface area per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:A999 = Microzooplankton taxonomy-related biosurface area per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Microzooplankton surface area per unit volume of the water column parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:V999 = Microzooplankton taxonomy-related biovolume per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:V999 = Microzooplankton taxonomy-related biovolume per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Microzooplankton biovolume parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MINC = Mineral chemistry
entry.description: Chemical analyses of minerals extracted from rocks or sediment or analysed in-situ using techniques like the electron microprobe.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CLAY = Mineralogical composition
entry.description: Parameters describing or quantifying the mineralogical composition of rocks and unlithified sediments.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:RBHY = Molecular biology parameters
entry.description: Any parameters relating to molecular biology or genetics

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MPMN = Moored instrument depth
entry.description: Parameters expressing depth (possibly as pressure) of an instrument on a suspended underwater mooring. These are primarily collected to monitor mooring performance by quantifying knock-down and should not be regarded as instrument z co-ordinates (accurate calibration is rare) or as sea level measurements.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:NTUP = New production in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:NTUP = New production in water bodies
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the uptake rate of nitrate or gaseous nitrogen by flora and fauna living in any body of salt or fresh water

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:NTRA = Nitrate concentration parameters in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:NTRA = Nitrate concentration parameters in the water column
entry.description: Nitrate concentration parameters (including statistical parameters such as standard deviation) in the water column. Includes nitrate+nitrite, which is often loosely referred to as nitrate.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:AMOX = Nitrification rate in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:AMOX = Nitrification rate in the water column
entry.description: Parameters relating to the rate of nitrification (oxidation of reduced nitrogen such as ammonium) in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:NTRI = Nitrite concentration parameters in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:NTRI = Nitrite concentration parameters in the water column
entry.description: Nitrite concentration parameters (including statistical parameters such as standard deviation) in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:NTSD = Nitrogen concentrations in sediment
entry.description: Concentrations of total, organic and inorganic nitrogen per unit weight of sediment. Sediment is understood to be the solid phase of the bed, including the recently settled material sometimes known as fluff collected from the bed surface.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:NTSP = Nitrogen concentrations in suspended particulate material
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:NTSP = Nitrogen concentrations in suspended particulate material
entry.description: Concentrations of total, organic and inorganic nitrogen per unit weight of suspended particulate material collected by water column filtration, centrifugation or sediment trapping. Note that it is common practice to assume all nitrogen in SPM is organic.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:NTPW = Nutrient concentrations in sediment pore waters
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:NTPW = Nutrient concentrations in sediment pore waters
entry.description: Nutrient (nitrate, nitrite, ammonium, phosphate, silicate and urea) concentrations in sediment pore waters

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SAMO = Nutrient fluxes between the bed and the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:SAMO = Nutrient fluxes between the bed and the water column
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the exchange of nutrients between the bed (ie the sediment) and the water column sometimes termed benthic fluxes

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:R410 = Ocean colour and earth-leaving visible waveband spectral radiation
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:R410 = Ocean colour and earth-leaving visible waveband spectral radiation
entry.description: Parameters associated with the measurement of ocean colour, including visible waveband satellite spectral radiometer measurements, their calibration measurements (spectral water-leaving radiance and reflectance) and chart colour estimates.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:OPBS = Optical backscatter
entry.description: Includes all parameters covering the strength of electromagnetic radiation signal return, including absolute measurements of returning signal strength as well as parameters expressed as backscatter (the proportion of transmitted signal returned)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CSDE = Organic sulphur compound dynamics in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:CSDE = Organic sulphur compound dynamics in the water column
entry.description: Parameters relating to the rates of creation and consumption of organic sulphur compounds (such as DMS and carbonyl sulphide) in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:OMBI = Organometallic species concentration parameters in biota
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:OMBI = Organometallic species concentration parameters in biota
entry.description: All measurements of the quantity or mass of any organometallic compound in any living organisms or their component parts

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:OMPW = Organometallic species concentration parameters in sediments
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:OMPW = Organometallic species concentration parameters in sediments
entry.description: All organometallic compound concentration parameters (including saturations for gaseous species) in all phases of sediments (including pore waters)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:OMWC = Organometallic species concentration parameters in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:OMWC = Organometallic species concentration parameters in water bodies
entry.description: All organometallic compound concentration parameters (including saturations for gaseous species) in all phases of any body of fresh or salt water

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:DMST = Organosulphur species concentration parameters in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:DMST = Organosulphur species concentration parameters in the water column
entry.description: All organosulphur compound concentration parameters (including saturations for gaseous species) in all phases of the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SICO = Other fluxes between the bed and the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:SICO = Other fluxes between the bed and the water column
entry.description: Fluxes of species other than metals and nutrients between the bed (ie the sediment) and the water column sometimes termed benthic fluxes or sediment demand

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:DCMX = Other halocarbon concentrations in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:DCMX = Other halocarbon concentrations in water bodies
entry.description: Concentrations of volatile halocarbons (compounds comprising carbon atoms covalently bonded to fluorine, chlorine, bromine or iodine atoms) other than tracers (i.e. freons/chlorofluorocarbons) and contaminants in any body of fresh or salt water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:HLDE = Other halocarbon dynamics in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:HLDE = Other halocarbon dynamics in water bodies
entry.description: Parameters relating to the rates of creation and consumption of volatile halocarbons (compounds comprising carbon atoms covalently bonded to fluorine, chlorine, bromine or iodine atoms) other than tracers (i.e. freons/chlorofluorocarbons) and contaminants in any body of fresh or salt water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:OMET = Other meteorological measurements
entry.description: Bucket group for parameters that cannot be classified elsewhere

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:DENS = Other physical and chemical properties of suspended particulate material
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:DENS = Other physical and chemical properties of suspended particulate material
entry.description: Parameters that do not easily fit into any of the other SPM data categories.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:KRTS = Other wave statistics
entry.description: Statistical parameters derived from wave data expressing wave properties other than height, period and direction

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GOXP = Oxygen production and respiration in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:GOXP = Oxygen production and respiration in the water column
entry.description: Parameters related to the rates of oxygen production and consumption

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:OZON = Ozone and oxygen concentrations in the atmosphere
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:OZON = Ozone and oxygen concentrations in the atmosphere
entry.description: Ozone and oxygen concentration parameters in any phase of the atmosphere (but usually the gaseous phase)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PCLM = Palaeoclimatic indicators and parameters
entry.description: Parameterisations that describe climatic conditions in the past. Includes climate indices, climate indicators and indirect measurements of climate-related phenomena such as sea level and water table depth.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PCO2 = Partial pressure (pCO2) and fugacity (fCO2) of carbon dioxide in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PCO2 = Partial pressure (pCO2) and fugacity (fCO2) of carbon dioxide in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:DAAW = Particulate amino acid concentrations in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:DAAW = Particulate amino acid concentrations in the water column
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the amount of organic compounds containing both a carboxyl group and an amino group in solids suspended in a body of water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CING = Particulate inorganic carbon concentrations in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:CING = Particulate inorganic carbon concentrations in the water column
entry.description: Concentrations of inorganic carbon in the particulate phase of the water column as extracted by a fitration technique. This is the particle-bound concentration per unit volume of the water column. Consequently, it is both a function of the SPM concentration in the water column and the concentration of inorganic carbon per unit weight of the SPM.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MTWP = Particulate metal concentrations in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MTWP = Particulate metal concentrations in the water column
entry.description: Concentration parameters for metallic elements in the particulate phase of the water column collected by fitration, centrifugation or sediment trapping

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CORG = Particulate total and organic carbon concentrations in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:CORG = Particulate total and organic carbon concentrations in the water column
entry.description: Concentrations of total and organic carbon in the particulate phase of the water column as extracted by a filtration technique. This is the particle-bound concentration per unit volume of the water column and is both a function of the SPM concentration in the water column and the concentration of carbon per unit weight of SPM. Total and organic carbon are classed together to circumvent confusion caused by total carbon data sets codeled 'POC' on the assumption that the inorganic carbon fraction is negligible

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:NTOT = Particulate total and organic nitrogen concentrations in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:NTOT = Particulate total and organic nitrogen concentrations in the water column
entry.description: Concentrations of total and organic nitrogen in the particulate phase of the water column, which is a function of both the SPM concentration in the water column and the concentration of nitrogen per unit weight of SPM. Note that it is commonly assumed that all particulate nitrogen is organic.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:TPHS = Particulate total and organic phosphorus concentrations in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:TPHS = Particulate total and organic phosphorus concentrations in the water column
entry.description: Concentrations of total and organic phosphorus in the particulate phase of the water column, which is a function of both the SPM concentration in the water column and the concentration of phosphorus per unit weight of SPM.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MDWP = Particulate trace metalloid concentrations in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MDWP = Particulate trace metalloid concentrations in the water column
entry.description: Concentration parameters for trace metalloid elements in the particulate phase of the water column collected by fitration, centrifugation or sediment trapping. Trace metalloids are considered as B, Ge, As, Sb, Te and Po (but not Si which is classed separately because of its major role in environmental chemistry)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PASR = Passive seismic refraction
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the magnitude of naturally occurring low frequency earth movements such as used for earthquake seismology and natural noise studies.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PEBI = Pesticide concentrations in biota
entry.description: Concentration parameters for substances synthesised by man to kill other life forms in either whole organisms or their constituent parts.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PESD = Pesticide concentrations in sediment
entry.description: Concentration parameters for substances synthesised by man to kill other life forms in sediment, which is considered to be anything from the bed sampled by a grab or corer, including 'fluff'.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PEWB = Pesticide concentrations in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PEWB = Pesticide concentrations in water bodies
entry.description: Concentration parameters for substances synthesised by man to kill other life forms in either solution or suspension (i.e.includes measurements in both the dissolved and particulate phases) in any body of salt or fresh water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PHSD = Phaeopigment concentrations in sediment
entry.description: Includes all variants of phaeopigment (chlorophyll degradation products). Sediment is defined as any solids collected by a corer, including fluff..

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PHWC = Phaeopigment concentrations in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PHWC = Phaeopigment concentrations in the water column
entry.description: Includes all variants of phaeopigment (chlorophyll degradation products) expressed in terms of per unit volume or unit area of the water column. Does not include data expressed per unit mass of SPM.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PHBI = Pharmaceutical concentrations in biota
entry.description: Concentration parameters for substances synthesised by man to modify bodily function or diagnose, cure, mitigate, treat, or prevent disease in either whole organisms or their constituent parts.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PHSE = Pharmaceutical concentrations in sediments
entry.description: Concentration parameters for substances synthesised by man to modify bodily function or diagnose, cure, mitigate, treat, or prevent disease in sediment, which is considered to be anything from the bed sampled by a grab or corer, including 'fluff'.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PHWB = Pharmaceutical concentrations in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PHWB = Pharmaceutical concentrations in water bodies
entry.description: Concentration parameters for substances synthesised by man to modify bodily function or diagnose, cure, mitigate, treat, or prevent disease in either solution or suspension (i.e.includes measurements in both the dissolved and particulate phases) in any body of salt or fresh water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PHOS = Phosphate concentration parameters in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PHOS = Phosphate concentration parameters in the water column
entry.description: Phosphate concentration parameters (including statistical parameters such as standard deviation) in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PXSP = Phosphorus concentrations in suspended particulate material
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PXSP = Phosphorus concentrations in suspended particulate material
entry.description: Concentrations of total, organic and inorganic phosphorus per unit weight of suspended particulate material collected by water column filtration, centrifugation or sediment trapping.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PHYC = Phycobolin pigment concentrations in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PHYC = Phycobolin pigment concentrations in the water column
entry.description: Concentration of phycobolin group pigments such as phycocyanin and phycoerythrin in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PNTX = Phytoplankton generic abundance in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PNTX = Phytoplankton generic abundance in water bodies
entry.description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, abundance) of free-floating autotrophic biological entities designated by terms other than taxonomic names (e.g. microphytoplankton, ciliate, flagellate) in any body of fresh or salt water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CNTX = Phytoplankton generic biomass in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:CNTX = Phytoplankton generic biomass in water bodies
entry.description: Any parameterisation of biomass (e.g. wet weight, dry weight, carbon, nitrogen etc.) of free-floating autotrophic biological entities designated by terms other than taxonomic names (e.g. microphytoplankton, ciliate, flagellate) in any body of fresh or salt water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PATX = Phytoplankton taxonomic abundance in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PATX = Phytoplankton taxonomic abundance in water bodies
entry.description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, abundance) of free-floating autotrophic biological entities designated by taxonomic names (e.g. species, genus, family) in any body of fresh or salt water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CATX = Phytoplankton taxonomic biomass in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:CATX = Phytoplankton taxonomic biomass in water bodies
entry.description: Any parameterisation of biomass (e.g. wet weight, dry weight, carbon, nitrogen etc.) of free-floating autotrophic biological entities identified by their taxonomic names (e.g. family, genus, species) in any body of fresh or salt water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:AATX = Phytoplankton taxonomic surface area in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:AATX = Phytoplankton taxonomic surface area in water bodies
entry.description: Any parameterisation of cell surface area of free-floating autotrophic biological entities designated by taxonomic names (e.g. species, genus, family) in any body of fresh or salt water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:VATX = Phytoplankton taxonomic volume in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:VATX = Phytoplankton taxonomic volume in water bodies
entry.description: Any parameterisation of cell volume of free-floating autotrophic biological entities designated by taxonomic names (e.g. species, genus, family) in any body of fresh or salt water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PYTT = Plankton abundance per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PYTT = Plankton abundance per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Used for plankton abundance parameters where no differentiation between phytoplankton, microzooplankton or zooplankton is possible

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CYEU = Plankton biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:CYEU = Plankton biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Used for plankton carbon biomass parameters where no differentiation between phytoplankton, microzooplankton or zooplankton is possible

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:HEAD = Platform or instrument orientation
entry.description: Parameters that describe the displacement of platforms or instruments in space relative to various origins

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GP001 = Pollution events
SDN:P021:68:CPRP = Precipitation and evaporation
entry.description: Parameters relating to all kinds of precipitation (rain, snow, etc.) and water loss from the surface of the Earth

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:RWCH = Precipitation chemistry
entry.description: Concentration of any chemical species in water collected from the atmosphere. Includes rain, snow, hail and fog but excludes cloud samples or snow accumulations on the ground.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PPRD = Primary production in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PPRD = Primary production in the water column
entry.description: Parameters associated with the quantification of primary production. This is defined as the fixation of carbon dioxide into either organic or inorganic carbon by living entities and so includes photosynthesis and calcification.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:QDMD = Quantity of material dumped
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the amount of liquids (e.g. ship's ballast) or solids (e.g. dredge spoil) deposited into the water column as a result of man's activities

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:RBSC = Radar backscatter
entry.description: Includes all parameters covering the strength of emitted microwave radiation return, including absolute measurements of returning signal strength as well as parameters expressed as backscatter (the proportion of transmitted signal returned)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GERA = Radiation geophysics
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the level of radioactive emissions from in-situ geologic units

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:BRAD = Radioactivity in biota
entry.description: All parameters associated with radioactivity in either whole organisms or their constituent parts

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:WRAD = Radioactivity in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:WRAD = Radioactivity in the water column
entry.description: All parameters associated with radiocativity in the water column, including radiation counts, isotope activities and activity ratios. Activities per unit mass of SPM are included

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:LERR = Raw current meter output parameters
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:LERR = Raw current meter output parameters
entry.description: Parameters as logged by measuring devices, including raw counts/voltages and ADCP relative velocities

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:FVLT = Raw fluorometer output
entry.description: Output as logged from any type fluorometer.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:RGAS = Raw gas analyser output
entry.description: Raw concentration parameters from a gas analyser such as a LiCor

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:NUTV = Raw in-situ nutrient analyser output
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:NUTV = Raw in-situ nutrient analyser output
entry.description: Direct output parameters from spectophotometric or chemical in-situ nutrient analysers

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:OXYC = Raw oxygen sensor output
entry.description: Raw parameters (usually membrane current and temperature) from dissolved oxygen sensors

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:TVLT = Raw suspended particulate material optical sensor output
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:TVLT = Raw suspended particulate material optical sensor output
entry.description: Raw parameters (voltages and counts) from in-situ suspended particulate material sensors including transmissometers, nephelometers and in-situ particle sizers

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:TCNT = Raw temperature and/or salinity instrument output
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:TCNT = Raw temperature and/or salinity instrument output
entry.description: Direct output parameters from TS instruments such as thermosalinograph or CTD

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IS4R = Reduction rates in bed sediments
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:IS4R = Reduction rates in bed sediments
entry.description: Reduction rates of any species in sediment cores

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ACYC = Reference numbers
entry.description: Data record, event, sample or measurement reference numbers

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:AMUP = Regenerated production in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:AMUP = Regenerated production in water bodies
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the uptake rate of nitrogen from excretion products (ammonium and urea) by flora and fauna living in any body of salt or fresh water

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GP068 = Reptile abundance
entry.description: Parameters related to the abundance of reptiles (Class Reptilia)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GP067 = Reptile disease and parasites
entry.description: Parameters relating to diseases and parasites of reptiles (Class Reptilia)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GP069 = Reptile reproduction
entry.description: Parameters related to the reproduction of reptiles (Class Reptilia)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:RVDS = River flow and discharge
entry.description: Parameters related to the volume of water passing through a point in a river system per unit time, including the rates of freshwater, dissolved material and particulate load discharge from a river into the sea.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:RAGE = Rock age
entry.description: Measured or stratigraphically estimated ages of lithified sediments, igneous rock or metamorphic rock.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:RALT = Rock alteration
entry.description: Parameters decribing aspects of a geologic unit that are the result of bulk chemical, mineralogical or physical changes related to change in the physical or chemical environment. Includes weathering, supergene alteration, hydrothermal alteration and metasomatic effects not considered metamorphic.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ROGS = Rock grain size
entry.description: Parameters specifying the physical dimensions of the particles comprising lithified sedimentary rocks (including expressions of shape such as aspect ratio) and statistics derived from their variation in a sample (e.g. mean, mode, sorting, skewness).

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:RPER = Rock porosity and permeability
entry.description: Parmeters describing the space for fluids or gases within a geologic unit comprising lithified sediments, igneous rock or metamorphic rock.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:RTCO = Rock thermal conductivity
entry.description: Parameters that describe the degree to which sedimentary, igneous or metamorphic rocks are able to conduct heat

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PSAL = Salinity of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PSAL = Salinity of the water column
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the concentration of sodium chloride in any body of water at any point between the bed and the atmosphere

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ASLV = Sea level
entry.description: Measurements and predictions of the displacement of the water column surface from a fixed, stable reference

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PREX = Sea level expressed as pressure
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PREX = Sea level expressed as pressure
entry.description: Measurements of the displacement of the water column surface from a fixed, stable reference expressed as either total pressure or sea pressure

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SBPH = Seabed photography
entry.description: Digital images of the seabed obtained using either still or video cameras

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:FOCA = Seal abundance
entry.description: Parameters that specify the number of specified members of Family Phocidae present at a particular time and location, including presence/absence indicators.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SEBH = Seal behaviour
entry.description: Parameters describing the actions or reactions of seals (Family Phocidae), usually in response to the environment. Includes both parameters mapped to taxa and those mapped to non-taxonomic groupings.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SEMP = Seal morphology and physiology
entry.description: Parameters describing the size, shape or physiological activity including disease and parasite infection status of seals (Family Phocidae). Includes both parameters mapped to taxa and those mapped to non-taxonomic groupings.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SEMO = Seal mortality
entry.description: Parameters describing the causes and rate of mortality of Seals (Family Phocidae). Includes both parameters mapped to taxa and those mapped to non-taxonomic groupings.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GP025 = Seal reproduction
entry.description: Parameters related to the reproduction of seals (Family Phocidae)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SECC = Secchi disk depth
entry.description: Measurements of optical visibility in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:XKEY = Security tags and keys
entry.description: Parameters used to encode information specifying access rights to data, usually in terms of authorised roles

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:RACC = Sediment accumulation rate
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the volume, mass or thickness of particulate material that gathers on the seabed per unit time.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SDAC = Sediment acoustics
entry.description: Parameters relating to the elucidation of sediment structure by quantifying the proportion of waves from a low energy source reflected by sub-surface layers.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SAGE = Sediment age
entry.description: Measured or stratigraphically estimated ages of marine sediments

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MNGS = Sediment grain size parameters
entry.description: Parameters specifying the physical dimensions of the particles comprising unlithified sediment (including expressions of shape such as aspect ratio) and statistics derived from their variation in a sample (e.g. mean, mode, sorting, skewness).

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GHDX = Sediment microfossil morphology parameters
entry.description: Parameters relating to the size, shape and form of microfossils in sediment samples

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:BEST = Sediment resuspension
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the critera for and extent of sediment resuspension

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:STCO = Sediment thermal conductivity
entry.description: Parameters that describe the degree to which unlithified sediment is able to conduct heat

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:WCWT = Sediment water content, porosity and surface area
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:WCWT = Sediment water content, porosity and surface area
entry.description: Sediment porosity (water content by volume) and water content by weight parameters

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SSTR = Sedimentary structure
entry.description: Parameters characterising structure in sedimentary rocks and unlithified sediment such as bedding, lamination and bioturbation.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:A01X = Sedimentation flux of alkenones and alkenoates in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:A01X = Sedimentation flux of alkenones and alkenoates in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:AAFX = Sedimentation flux of amino acids and associated compounds in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:AAFX = Sedimentation flux of amino acids and associated compounds in water bodies
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the amount of organic compounds containing both a carboxyl group and an amino group (including compounds such as salts and esters) sinking vertically as particles through a unit area of a water body in units time.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:FPFX = Sedimentation flux of biological detritus in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:FPFX = Sedimentation flux of biological detritus in the water column
entry.description: Flux of biological detritus (material derived from the water column such as exuvia and faecal pellets) in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CBFX = Sedimentation flux of carbohydates in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:CBFX = Sedimentation flux of carbohydates in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:TCFX = Sedimentation flux of carbon, nitrogen or organic matter in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:TCFX = Sedimentation flux of carbon, nitrogen or organic matter in the water column
entry.description: Fluxes of particulate total, organic and inorganic carbon (including as CaCO3) and nitrogen (often measured as 'total' but assumed to be 'organic'). Organic matter is defined as matter lost on ignition.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PCFX = Sedimentation flux of identified biota expressed as carbon in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PCFX = Sedimentation flux of identified biota expressed as carbon in the water column
entry.description: Fluxes of any biota or remains thereof (excluding faecal pellets which are classed as SPM) downwards through the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PNFX = Sedimentation flux of identified biota in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PNFX = Sedimentation flux of identified biota in the water column
entry.description: Fluxes expressed as number per unit area per unit time of any biota or remains thereof (excluding faecal pellets which are classed as SPM) downwards through the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MLFX = Sedimentation flux of metals in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MLFX = Sedimentation flux of metals in the water column
entry.description: Fluxes expressed as amount of metallic element per unit area per unit time

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:OPFX = Sedimentation flux of non-metallic inorganic species in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:OPFX = Sedimentation flux of non-metallic inorganic species in the water column
entry.description: Quantity of any inorganic species such as silicon (opal) and phosphorus passing through unit area of the water column in unit time. Carbon and nitrogen are regarded as organic and explicitly excluded

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:AXFX = Sedimentation flux of pigments in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:AXFX = Sedimentation flux of pigments in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:LIFX = Sedimentation flux of terrestrially derived material in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:LIFX = Sedimentation flux of terrestrially derived material in the water column
entry.description: Fluxes of terrestrial biological or lithological material

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MSFX = Sedimentation flux quantification in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MSFX = Sedimentation flux quantification in the water column
entry.description: Parameters expressing the total sedimentation flux in terms of particle mass, volume or counts

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SRFL = Seismic reflection
entry.description: Parameters relating to the elucidation of geological structure by quantifying the proportion of waves from a high energy source reflected by sub-surface layers.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SRFR = Seismic refraction
entry.description: Parameters relating to the elucidation of geological structure by quantifying the refration of waves from a high energy source by sub-surface layers.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SABB = Shellfish abundance and biomass in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:SABB = Shellfish abundance and biomass in water bodies
entry.description: Paramaters that quantify the numbers or amount of living material of shellfish (molluscs - including cephalopods - and crustaceans of interest to fisheries research and commercial fisheries) in any body of fresh or salt water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SATM = Shellfish morphology, age and physiology
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:SATM = Shellfish morphology, age and physiology
entry.description: Paramaters that quantify the size, shape, age and life processes (including mortality) of shellfish (molluscs - including cephalopods - and crustaceans of interest to fisheries research and commercial fisheries).

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SREP = Shellfish reproduction
entry.description: Paramaters that quantify the fecundity, reproductive rates or nature of reproduction in shellfish (molluscs - including cephalopods - and crustaceans of interest to fisheries research and commercial fisheries).

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SSCN = Side-scan sonar
entry.description: A technique for mapping the morphology of the seafloor using a sonar swath projected sideways from a towed underwater vehicle.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SLCA = Silicate concentration parameters in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:SLCA = Silicate concentration parameters in the water column
entry.description: Silicate concentration parameters (including statistical parameters such as standard deviation) in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PSST = Skin temperature of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PSST = Skin temperature of the water column
entry.description: Temperature of the water column surface as measured by a radiometer. It does NOT include temperature measurements in the upper few metres of the water column such as thermosalinograph data

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ICHM = Snow and ice chemistry
entry.description: Parameters related to the chemical composition of any kind of water sample that was frozen solid at the time of sampling or measurement

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CRYS = Snow and ice mass, thickness and extent
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:CRYS = Snow and ice mass, thickness and extent
entry.description: Measurements of quantity (mass), thickness and spatial extent of snow and ice

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IPHY = Snow and ice physical properties and characteristics
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:IPHY = Snow and ice physical properties and characteristics
entry.description: Parameters related to physical properties (e.g. colour, density, in-situ temperature) or characteristics (e.g. sea ice type) of any kind of water sample that was in its solid state at the time of sampling or measurement

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CSLR = Solar Radiation
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the irradiance of the sun impinging on the Earth's surface in the visible and infra-red waveband, generally accepted as wavelengths between 300 and 3000 nm

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SVEL = Sound velocity and travel time in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:SVEL = Sound velocity and travel time in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:WVSP = Spectral wave data parameters
entry.description: Parameters for directional and non-directional spectral wave data, excluding wave directions derived from spectral data.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SPAG = Speleothem age
entry.description: Measured or stratigraphically estimated ages of secondary mineral deposits in caves. This includes stalactites, stalagmites, flowstone, and crystal growths.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IRBO = Stable isotope enrichment in biota
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:IRBO = Stable isotope enrichment in biota
entry.description: Stable isotope enrichment parameters from measurements on living (at the time of sampling) organisms or parts thereof

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SSTB = Stable isotope enrichment in sediment
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:SSTB = Stable isotope enrichment in sediment
entry.description: Stable isotope enrichment parameters in sediment, including biota-associated parameters such as isotope enrichment in foraminifera tests

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SIPW = Stable isotope enrichment in sediment pore waters
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:SIPW = Stable isotope enrichment in sediment pore waters
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the relative proportions of stable isotopes in either the solute or solvent phase of sediment pore waters

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:IRSP = Stable isotope enrichment in speleothems
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:IRSP = Stable isotope enrichment in speleothems
entry.description: Stable isotope enrichment parameters in secondary mineral deposits in caves. This includes stalactites, stalagmites, flowstone, and crystal growths.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ISAT = Stable isotope enrichment in the atmosphere
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ISAT = Stable isotope enrichment in the atmosphere
entry.description: Stable isotope enrichment parameters in both the gaseous and aerosol phases of the atmosphere

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:WSTB = Stable isotope enrichment in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:WSTB = Stable isotope enrichment in the water column
entry.description: Stable isotope enrichment parameters in both the dissolved and particulate phases of the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MXLM = Structure and stability of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MXLM = Structure and stability of the water column
entry.description: Parameters describing or predicting water column structure plus parameters quantifying the dynamic stability of that structure

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SUAT = Sulphur species concentrations in the atmosphere
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:SUAT = Sulphur species concentrations in the atmosphere
entry.description: Concentration of sulphur species (element or compounds) in any phase of the atmosphere. Includes sulphur dioxide.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ABAG = Suspended particulate material aggregates
entry.description: Parameters relating to the abundance, size and morphology of particle aggregates in the SPM

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MDSV = Suspended particulate material setting velocity parameters
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MDSV = Suspended particulate material setting velocity parameters
entry.description: Includes all SPM grain size measurements and derived statistics

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MDSV = Suspended particulate material setting velocity parameters
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MDSV = Suspended particulate material setting velocity parameters

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:STMP = Temperature of geological units
entry.description: Parameters that describe the distribution of the degree of hotness within a body of rock or unlithified sediment.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:TEMP = Temperature of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:TEMP = Temperature of the water column
entry.description: Temperature parameters in any body of water at any point between the bed and the atmosphere excluding the top few microns sampled by radiometers known as the skin

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PTDZ = Temperature variation in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PTDZ = Temperature variation in the water column
entry.description: Parameters expressing the variation of temperature in the water column either as a function of space or of time

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:TD00 = Terrestrial detritus in the water column suspended particulate material
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:TD00 = Terrestrial detritus in the water column suspended particulate material
entry.description: Parameters quantifying and categorising terrestrially-derived detritus (eg dust and pollen) in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:COAS = Terrestrial mapping
entry.description: Parameters relating to the mapping of terrestrial features, including coastlines

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:LWET = Terrestrial water content
entry.description: Parameters relating to the water held by land masses such as soil and vegetation moisture content

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SR3D = Three-dimensional seismic reflection
entry.description: Parameters relating to structure beneath sea-bed determined by the reflection of seismic energy along multiple parallel tracks.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:TCO2 = Total dissolved inorganic carbon (TCO2) concentration in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:TCO2 = Total dissolved inorganic carbon (TCO2) concentration in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CCPW = Total dissolved inorganic carbon (TCO2) in sediment pore waters
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:CCPW = Total dissolved inorganic carbon (TCO2) in sediment pore waters
entry.description: Carbonate system parameters (DIC/TCO2, pH, alkalinity, pCO2) in sediment pore waters

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MTWT = Total metal concentrations in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MTWT = Total metal concentrations in water bodies
entry.description: Concentration parameters for metal elements in the combined dissolved and particulate phases of any body of fresh or salt water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MDBO = Trace metalloid concentrations in biota
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MDBO = Trace metalloid concentrations in biota
entry.description: Concentration parameters for trace metalloid elements in either whole organisms or their constituent parts. Trace metalloids are considered as B, Ge, As, Sb, Te and Po (but not Si which is classed separately because of its major role in environmental chemistry)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MDPW = Trace metalloid concentrations in sediment pore water
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MDPW = Trace metalloid concentrations in sediment pore water
entry.description: Concentration parameters for trace metalloid elements in water occupying the space between sediment grains. Trace metalloids are considered as B, Ge, As, Sb, Te and Po (but not Si which is classed separately because of its major role in environmental chemistry)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ATTN = Transmittance and attenuance of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ATTN = Transmittance and attenuance of the water column
entry.description: Parameters relating to the rate of electromagnetic radiation intensity decrease as it travels through the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:TRAN = Transport activity
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the level of activity moving people or cargo from one place to another.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:VDFC = Transport in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:VDFC = Transport in the water column
entry.description: Parameters describing the transport of material, heat or energy in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:EPSI = Turbulence in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:EPSI = Turbulence in the water column
entry.description: Measured parameters expressing turbulence in the water column plus parameters derived from these measurements

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:SR2D = Two-dimensional seismic reflection
entry.description: Parameters relating to structure beneath sea-bed determined by the reflection of seismic energy along a single track.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:UVRD = Ultra-violet (UV) radiation
entry.description: Parameters relating to the intensity of ultra-violet radiation in either the atmosphere or the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CPCN = Unclassified pigment concentrations in sediment
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:CPCN = Unclassified pigment concentrations in sediment
entry.description: Includes all pigments that cannot be explicitly classified as chlorophylls, phaeopigments or carotenoids (usually groups of pigments). Sediment includes anything collected by a grab or corer, including the fluff layer from the top of the consolidated sediment.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:OPWC = Unclassified pigment concentrations in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:OPWC = Unclassified pigment concentrations in the water column
entry.description: Includes all pigments that cannot be explicitly classified as chlorophylls, phaeopigments or carotenoids. Generally, these are parameters where different pigments have been grouped together. Concentrations are expressed in terms of per unit volume or unit area of the water column. Does not include data expressed per unit mass of SPM.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZZZZ = Unspecified
entry.description: The identity of the parameter is not declared. Covers cases such as internal working parameters and dummy channels.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:PHUP = Uptake of other nutrients in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:PHUP = Uptake of other nutrients in the water column
entry.description: Uptake of nutrients other than nitrogen species (ie phosphate and silicate) by the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:UREA = Urea concentration parameters in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:UREA = Urea concentration parameters in the water column
entry.description: Urea concentration parameters (including statistical parameters such as standard deviation) in the water column

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:CMFL = Variable fluorescence parameters
entry.description: Parameters measured by variable fluorescence instruments such as pump and probe and fast repetition rate fluorometers

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:APZA = Vertical platform movement
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the upward and downward motion of objects mounting sensors or collecting samples.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:AHGT = Vertical spatial coordinates
entry.description: All vertical spatial parameters including depth, height and pressure when used as an independent variable.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:LRZA = Vertical velocity of the water column (currents)
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:LRZA = Vertical velocity of the water column (currents)
entry.description: Vertical water movement parameters including non-directional speeds

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:VIRU = Virus abundance in water bodies
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:VIRU = Virus abundance in water bodies
entry.description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, number per square metre) of viruses in any body of fresh or salt water.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:VSRA = Visible waveband radiance and irradiance measurements in the atmosphere
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:VSRA = Visible waveband radiance and irradiance measurements in the atmosphere
entry.description: Includes visible waveband measurements at discrete wavelengths and PAR integrated values as photon and energy fluxes. Does not include satellite radiometer and associated calibration parameters (e.g. water-leaving radiance and reflectance)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:VSRW = Visible waveband radiance and irradiance measurements in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:VSRW = Visible waveband radiance and irradiance measurements in the water column
entry.description: Includes measurements at discrete wavelengths and PAR integrated values, measurements as photon and energy fluxes.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:WCTR = Water body released tracers
entry.description: Parameters describing the amount in a sample of a tracer (rhodamine, SF6, 3He, etc.) that has been purposely released into a water body to track water mass movements or quantify exchanges with the atmosphere.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:WCPH = Water column photography
entry.description: Digital images of the water column obtained using either still or video cameras

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:WQBI = Water quality bioindicators
entry.description: Parameters quantifying fauna and flora that indicate physical or chemical conditions in the water column such as colonisation depths and abundance of indicator species.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GWDR = Wave direction
entry.description: Direct measurements (including visual estimates) plus statistically derived parameters

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:WVST = Wave height and period statistics
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:WVST = Wave height and period statistics
entry.description: Statistical parameters derived from wave records to express wave height and period.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:HEAV = Wave height estimates
entry.description: Measurements of wave height that are not based on the statistical analysis of wave records, such as heave, surface roughness and visual height estimates

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:EWSB = Wind speed and direction
entry.description: All parameters pertaining to wind velocity in either cartesian or polar co-ordinates. Units are a watchpoint as some codes specify knots.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:WSTR = Wind stress and shear
entry.description: Parameters related to forces due to interactions between atmosphere and the surface of the earth or between atmospheric air masses

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MFAB = Zoobenthos generic abundance
entry.description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, number per square metre) of animals living on or near the seabed designated by terms other than taxonomic names (e.g. total).

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MFWW = Zoobenthos non taxonomy-related wet weight biomass per unit area of the bed
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MFWW = Zoobenthos non taxonomy-related wet weight biomass per unit area of the bed
entry.description: Any zoobenthos wet weight biomass per unit area of the seabed parameters that are not included in parameter group ZWTX.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZFIT = Zoobenthos physiological condition parameters
entry.description: Parameters indicating the health of zoobenthos taxa, such as fecundity, egg condition, presence of parasites/diseases etc.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZBTX = Zoobenthos taxonomic abundance
entry.description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, number per square metre) of animals living on or near the seabed designated by taxonomic names (e.g. species, genus).

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZADX = Zoobenthos taxonomic dry weight biomass
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ZADX = Zoobenthos taxonomic dry weight biomass
entry.description: Any quantification of the dry mass of zoobenthos (animals living on,in or near the bed of any water body) designated by taxonomic names (e.g. species, genus). Includes animals normally considered planktonic if collected in sediment and data expressed ash-free and in terms of carbon, nitrogen etc..

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MFLZ = Zoobenthos taxonomy-related abundance per unit area of the littoral zone
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MFLZ = Zoobenthos taxonomy-related abundance per unit area of the littoral zone
entry.description: Any zoobenthos abundance per unit area of the littoral zone (between spring tide high and low water) parameters that are not fish or terrestrial animals (insecta/oligochaeta)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MFAZ = Zoobenthos taxonomy-related ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the littoral zone
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MFAZ = Zoobenthos taxonomy-related ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the littoral zone
entry.description: Any zoobenthos ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the littoral zone (between spring tide high and low water) parameters that are not fish or terrestrial animals (insecta/oligochaeta)

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZOOB = Zoobenthos taxonomy-related counts
entry.description: Zoobenthos count parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards. Count includes presence/absence indicators.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZWTX = Zoobenthos taxonomy-related wet weight biomass per unit area of the bed
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ZWTX = Zoobenthos taxonomy-related wet weight biomass per unit area of the bed
entry.description: Zoobenthos wet weight biomass per unit area parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. Includes animals considered as planktonic if they have been returned from sediment samples.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:DVLP = Zooplankton and zoobenthos development stage parameters
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:DVLP = Zooplankton and zoobenthos development stage parameters
entry.description: Development stage parameters (such as proportion but excluding abundance or biomass) of zooplankton and zoobenthos. Benthic and planktonic animals have not been seggregated because there is a degree of overlap (eg shrimps).

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:BLEN = Zooplankton and zoobenthos morphological parameters
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:BLEN = Zooplankton and zoobenthos morphological parameters
entry.description: Morphological parameters of zooplankton and zoobenthos (essentially any animal except for insects, earthworms or fish), such as size, shape and weight. Benthic and planktonic animals have not been seggregated because there is a degree of overlap (eg shrimps).

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MSBO = Zooplankton ash-free dry weight biomass per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MSBO = Zooplankton ash-free dry weight biomass per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Zooplankton (mesozooplankton and larger, exclusing fish, mammals, reptiles and insects) biomass determined by gravimetric measurement of loss on ignition

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MSIC = Zooplankton carbon biomass per unit area of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MSIC = Zooplankton carbon biomass per unit area of the water column
entry.description: Integrated zooplankton (mesozooplankton and larger, exclusing fish, mammals, reptiles and insects) carbon biomass parameters

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZCMP = Zooplankton chemical composition
entry.description: Chemical composition of zooplankton expressed in terms of mass (or molar quantity) per specimen or per unit tissue mass

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:FPRT = Zooplankton defecation rates in the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:FPRT = Zooplankton defecation rates in the water column
entry.description: Faecal pellet production and gut evacuation rates

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MSBD = Zooplankton dry weight biomass per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:MSBD = Zooplankton dry weight biomass per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Zooplankton (mesozooplankton and larger, exclusing fish, mammals, reptiles and insects) biomass determined by drying to constant weight.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:FCRT = Zooplankton feeding
entry.description: Parameters quantifying the ingestion of food by zooplankton (mesozooplankton and larger but excluding fish) in terms of identified biota or chemical species and the effects of nutrition on life processes such as physiology and reproduction.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GRZO = Zooplankton growth rates
entry.description: Parameters pertaining to zooplankton growth rates including biochemical proxies such as AARS activity

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GPIG = Zooplankton gut pigments
entry.description: Parameters identifying or quantifying zooplankton gut pigments

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZNTX = Zooplankton non taxonomy-related abundance per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ZNTX = Zooplankton non taxonomy-related abundance per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Zooplankton (mesozooplankton plus larger pelagic animals excluding fish, reptiles and mammals) abundance per unit volume parameters not included in group ZATX. Usually used for generic names such as 'mesozooplankton'.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZNTC = Zooplankton non taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ZNTC = Zooplankton non taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Zooplankton (mesozooplankton plus larger pelagic animals excluding fish, reptiles and mammals) carbon biomass per unit volume parameters not included in group ZCTC. Usually used for generic names such as 'mesozooplankton'.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZNTN = Zooplankton non taxonomy-related biomass expressed as nitrogen per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ZNTN = Zooplankton non taxonomy-related biomass expressed as nitrogen per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Zooplankton (mesozooplankton plus larger pelagic animals excluding fish, reptiles and mammals) nitrogen biomass per unit volume parameters not included in group ZCTC. Usually used for generic names such as 'mesozooplankton'.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZNTP = Zooplankton non taxonomy-related biomass expressed as protein per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ZNTP = Zooplankton non taxonomy-related biomass expressed as protein per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Zooplankton (mesozooplankton plus larger pelagic animals excluding fish, reptiles and mammals) protein biomass per unit volume for entities that have not been identified by taxonomic name

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:MSEP = Zooplankton reproduction rate parameters
entry.description: All parameters related to zooplankton reproduction rates

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZATX = Zooplankton taxonomy-related abundance per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ZATX = Zooplankton taxonomy-related abundance per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Zooplankton (mesozooplankton plus larger pelagic animals excluding fish, reptiles and mammals) abundance parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZCTC = Zooplankton taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ZCTC = Zooplankton taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Zooplankton (mesozooplankton plus larger pelagic animals excluding fish, reptiles and mammals) carbon biomass parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZCTN = Zooplankton taxonomy-related biomass expressed as nitrogen per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ZCTN = Zooplankton taxonomy-related biomass expressed as nitrogen per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Zooplankton (mesozooplankton plus larger pelagic animals excluding fish, reptiles and mammals) nitrogen biomass parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards.

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:ZATP = Zooplankton taxonomy-related biomass expressed as protein per unit volume of the water column
entry.code: SDN:P021:68:ZATP = Zooplankton taxonomy-related biomass expressed as protein per unit volume of the water column
entry.description: Zooplankton (mesozooplankton plus larger pelagic animals excluding fish, reptiles and mammals) protein biomass per unit volume for entities that have been identified by taxonomic name

entry.label: SDN:P021:68:GP079 = Zooplankton wet weight biomass
entry.description: Zooplankton (mesozooplankton and larger, exclusing fish, mammals, reptiles and insects) biomass determined by weighing unprocessed catch samples.

entry.label: SDN:C16:8:WAS = Wadden Sea
entry.description: Part of the North Sea between the Dutch, German and Danish coasts and the Frisian islands.

entry.label: SDN:C16:8:ZZ = Unknown
entry.description: The correct value is not known to and not computable by the creator of this information. However a correct value probably exists.

entry.label: SDN:C16:8:MKM = Markermeer
entry.description: Dutch freshwater lake with an artificial dam boundaries between it and IJsselmeer.

entry.label: SDN:C16:8:IRM = Irminger Sea
entry.description: The sea area confined between Greenland and Iceland south of the Denmark Strait (the ridge) and bounded to the south by a line from Cape Farewell to the southern tip of the 2000m isobath on the Reykjanes Ridge and a line following the top of the ridge to Iceland.

entry.code: SDN:C16:8:19 = Irish Sea and St. George's Channel
entry.label: SDN:C16:8:19 = Irish Sea and St. George's Channel

entry.label: SDN:C16:8:18 = Inner Seas off the West Coast of Scotland
SDN:C16:8:ICS = Iceland Sea
entry.description: Part of the Arctic Ocean to the North of Iceland between Greenland and the Norwegian Sea

entry.label: SDN:C16:8:IJM = IJsselmeer
entry.description: Dutch freshwater lake with artificial dam boundaries between it and the Wadden Sea to the North and Markermeer to the South.

entry.label: SDN:C16:8:48d = Gulf of Tomini (East Indian Archipelago)

entry.label: SDN:C16:8:59 = Coastal Waters of SE Alaska and British Columbia
SDN:C16:8:21a = Celtic Sea
entry.description: Formally accepted and defined by IHO as an S23(1953) extension.

entry.label: SDN:C16:8:CAS = Caspian Sea
entry.description: Large brackish inland water body having coastlines in Azerbaijan, Iran, Kazakhstan, Russia, and Turkmenistan.

entry.label: SDN:C16:8:200 = Atlantic Ocean
entry.description: Aggregation of North and South Atlantic Ocean areas

entry.label: SDN:C16:8:ARA = Aral Sea
entry.description: Large inland water body comprising three lakes (North Aral Sea, eastern and western basins of the South Aral Sea) having coastlines in Kazakhstan and Uzbekistan.
